DeepLearning.ai Courses Notes

This PDF contains Mahmoud Badry's personal notes and summaries on DeepLearning.ai specialization courses, including five courses taught by Andrew Ng on Coursera: Neural Networks and Deep Learning, Improving Deep Neural Networks, Structuring Machine Learning Projects, Convolutional Neural Networks, and Sequence Models.

Key Concepts:

  • Deep Learning Specialization
  • Neural Networks
  • Convolutional Neural Networks
  • Pseudo code for logistic regression
  • Forward pass and backward pass in logistic regression
  • Vectorization in deep learning
